about_the_game:
There is Still Hope is a single-player, adventurous, story-rich mystery game that takes you to a forest to uncover many secrets.

Main story

Your one of the great days turns into the worst day when you get a call that your beloved wife has gone missing. She disappears while working on an experiment. Your job is to find her at any cost. The story takes you to a dark forest containing many secrets.

Character


You play the main character named Tom. On a snowy day, you get a call from one of her colleagues. You go to the organization-owned forest to find her. There are objectives that need to be completed, and clues need to be found to uncover the mysteries of the forest.

Story-rich


There is Still Hope is a story-rich game that uncovers mysteries that lead you to different objectives.

Mechanics


You have a few tools with you at all times. Those include a gun, axe, compass, and torch. Those are primarily with you to help you navigate the unknowns of the woods. You also have a map that guides you to the location. The map also offers information about the tasks you must complete to explore the next tasks.

Features

    Live and dead animals
    Hidden sites to explore
    Great conversations
    Map to help you explore the wildness

Developer

Developed by a solo developer, the game is intense, suspenseful, and adventurous, to take you on an adventure you will never forget.

content_descriptors.notes: Certain objects and scenes in this game contain nudity and violence. The game also contains dead and live animals.
